notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: J.M.B. wrote the paper and designed the experiment. F.B.-M. wrote the paper and photogrammetry methodology. J.R. provided the initial idea, acoustic measurements and wrote the paper. M.F. wrote the paper, formal analysis and developed the acoustical theory. J.V.S.-P. project administration, funding acquisition and writingâ€”review and editing.
